field.name: summary
field.value: Add ability to specify root namespace for proxies

field.name: description
field.value:
Currently all proxies go into {{Castle.Proxies.*}} namespace (and its subnamespaces) and there's no way to change that.
For cases where multiple proxies are present in an application (for example NHibernate, Windsor and a mocking framework) it might be beneficial to allow each of these to specify their root namespace so that NHibernate proxies might go into {{NHibernate.Proxies.*}}, mocks might go into {{RhinoMocks.Mocks.*}} etc.
That will improve experience of working with proxies and make figuring out where given proxy comes from much easier

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: Actually that's quite trivial to accomplish with {{INamingScope}} in a very flexible fashion. Not sure we need anything more than that really... Perhaps other than advertising that extension point
